text: Giuseppe Galasso (19 November 1929 – 12 February 2018) was an Italian historian and politician who was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1994.Morto lo storico Giuseppe Galasso ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from Naples Category:Italian Republican Party politicians Category:Deputies of Legislature IX of Italy Category:Deputies of Legislature X of Italy Category:Deputies of Legislature XI of Italy Category:Politicians of Campania Category:Italian historians
title: Giuseppe Galasso
